### 1rss

> 

```bash
npm install hexo-generator-feed
```

<!--more-->
### 2`_config.yml`

```yaml
# Extensions
plugins:
  hexo-generator-feed
#Feed Atom
feed:
  type: atom
  path: atom.xml
  limit: 20
```

```yaml
# RSS
rss: /atom.xml
```

### 4RSS

```
hexo g
```

Post.title: HexoGitment
Post._content:
##### Tips:
- [](https://zhousiwei.gitee.io/)
- **[hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)**

> Gitment  GitHub Issues  `Markdown` / `GFM`  GitHub Pages 

<!--more-->
------------------
### 1 OAuth Application
>  OAuth Application  [OAuth Application](https://github.com/settings/applications/new)

- `Application name` ()
- `Homepage URL` (URL)
- `Application description` ()
- `Authorization callback URL` URL()

![](/images/2743275-850f640ca28522cf.png)

### 2[hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)

###### Client IDClient Secret
![](/images/2743275-79e9217bf5e1e2b2.png)

##### [hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)`_config.yml`
```yaml
gitment_owner: JoeyBling      # GitHub ID
gitment_remote: false  # js(false)
gitment_repo: 'yilia-plus-demo'          # repo
gitment_oauth:
  client_id: '*********'           #client ID
  client_secret: '*********'       #client secret
```

### 3
```bash
hexo s -g
```
> **hexo-theme-yilia-plusDemo  [https://joeybling.github.io/yilia-plus-demo](https://joeybling.github.io/yilia-plus-demo)**

![](/images/2743275-9bd93b4ded42a272.png)

Post.title: HexoJSHTML
Post._content:
##### Tips:
- [](https://zhousiwei.gitee.io/)
- **[hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)**

>  GitHub  html  hexo  source  js  `hexo g` pubic  js  js 

### ( hexo )

> **Hexo 3.0 **
>  Hexo  _config.yml  `skip_render` 
<!--more-->

```yaml
skip_render: "test.html"    # source 

skip_render: test/*    # 

skip_render: test/*.md    # 

skip_render: test/**    # 

skip_render:         # 
  - test/*
  - test/*.html
```

> 

```yaml
#  hexo 
skip_render:
  - anires/**
  - assets/**
  - gitment/**
  - baidu_sitepush/**
  - canvas_nest/**
  - docs/**
  - 'baidu_verify_QzGNSJ7F59.html'
  - '*.html'
  - '*.js'
  - README.md
  - '*.sh'
  - '*.txt'
```

>  ```hexo clean```  ```hexo g```

Post.title: LinuxGit
Post._content:
#### 1yum
```shell
# yum -y install git
# yum remove git
```

#### 2
<!--more-->

```shell
---
# yum -y install curl-devel expat-devel gettext-devel openssl-devel zlib-devel gcc perl-ExtUtils-MakeMaker zlib
# cd /usr/local
----git
# wget https://github.com/git/git/archive/v2.21.0.tar.gz
----git
# tar -zxvf v2.21.0.tar.gz
# cd git-2.21.0/
# mkdir /usr/local/git
----
# make prefix=/usr/local/git all
# sudo make prefix=/usr/local/git install
# vim /etc/profile
----
export PATH=/usr/local/git/bin:$PATH
# source /etc/profile
# git --version
```

#### 3FAQ
###### 1 git
```
gzip: stdin: unexpected end of file
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Unexpected EOF in archive
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
```

Post.title: LinuxMySQL
Post._content:
##### Mysql
```shell
# service mysqld stop
```
##### 1
```shell
# mkdir -p /data/mysql
# chown -R mysql.mysql /data/mysql/
```
##### 2
```shell
# mysql_install_db --user=mysql --basedir=/usr --datadir=/data/mysql
```
<!--more-->
##### 3/var/lib/mysql
```shell
# rm -rf /var/lib/mysql/*
```
##### 4/etc/my.cnf
```shell
[mysqld]
datadir=/data/mysql
```
##### 5mysql
```shell
# chkconfig mysqld on
# service mysqld restart
```

Post.title: LinuxWinnodenpm
Post._content:
#### Node

> https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/download/
> nodenpm[https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/download/releases/](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/download/releases/)

![](/yilia-plus-demo/images/2743275-497a8e6f4e7c11d2.png)
<!--more-->

****

```shell
# cd /usr/local
# yum install -y xz
# xz -d node-v8.11.1-linux-x64.tar.xz
# tar -xf node-v8.11.1-linux-x64.tar
```

`npm`  `node`,
```shell
# cd /usr/local/bin
# ln -s /usr/local/src/node-v8.10.0-linux-x64/bin/npm
# ln -s /usr/local/src/node-v8.10.0-linux-x64/bin/node
```

 `node  -v`   `npm  -v`  

#### yumnodenpm`(Linux)`
```shell
# yum install epel-release -y
# yum install nodejs -y
```

#### `()`
```shell
# npm config get registry // https://registry.npmjs.org/
# npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
---- 
# npm config get registry
```

#### `()`

>  `node_global` 
>  `node_cache` 

```shell
# npm config set prefix D:\nodejs\node_global
# npm config set cache D:\nodejs\node_cache
---- 
# npm config get cache
# npm ls -g
```

####  cnpm`()`
```shell
# npm install cnpm -g --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org
# cnpm -v
```

#### Tips:
1. **npm**
```shell
# npm config ls
```

Post.title: MariaDB
Post._content:
#### 1
```shell
# mysql -uroot -proot
# show VARIABLES like 'char%';
```

![](/yilia-plus-demo/images/2743275-aed00e544adf23d4.png)
<!--more-->
#### 2ClientServerUTF-8

```shell
# vim /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf
```

**`server.cnf``[mysqld]`**

```properties
	init-connect='SET NAMES utf8'
	character-set-server = utf8
```

![](/yilia-plus-demo/images/2743275-109f93534d06e671.png)

###### MariaDB
```shell
# systemctl restart mariadb
--- 
# service mysqld restart
```

Post.title: Hexohelper-live2d
Post._content:
##### Tips:
- [](https://zhousiwei.gitee.io/)
- **[hexo-theme-yilia-plus](https://github.com/JoeyBling/hexo-theme-yilia-plus)**
- github[hexo-helper-live2d](https://github.com/EYHN/hexo-helper-live2d "hexo-helper-live2d")
- [live2d](https://github.com/xiazeyu/live2d-widget-models "live2d")
- Node  [Linuxnodenpm](https://www.jianshu.com/p/f8b0a4f7a822)
---
<!--more-->
##### 1
    **hexo**
```shell
# npm install --save hexo-helper-live2d
```
---
##### 2
      [ hexo live2d 2.0 !](https://huaji8.top/post/live2d-plugin-2.0/ " hexo live2d 2.0 !")
> [live2d](https://github.com/xiazeyu/live2d-widget-models "live2d")

- `live2d-widget-model-chitose`
- `live2d-widget-model-epsilon2_1`
- `live2d-widget-model-gf`
- `live2d-widget-model-haru/01` (use `npm install --save live2d-widget-model-haru`)
- `live2d-widget-model-haru/02` (use `npm install --save live2d-widget-model-haru`)
- `live2d-widget-model-haruto`
- `live2d-widget-model-hibiki`
- `live2d-widget-model-hijiki`
- `live2d-widget-model-izumi`
- `live2d-widget-model-koharu`
- `live2d-widget-model-miku`
- `live2d-widget-model-ni-j`
- `live2d-widget-model-nico`
- `live2d-widget-model-nietzsche`
- `live2d-widget-model-nipsilon`
- `live2d-widget-model-nito`
- `live2d-widget-model-shizuku`
- `live2d-widget-model-tororo`
- `live2d-widget-model-tsumiki`
- `live2d-widget-model-unitychan`
- `live2d-widget-model-wanko`
- `live2d-widget-model-z16`

`npm install {packagename}`
```shell
---
# npm install live2d-widget-model-hibiki
```
---
##### 3
Hexo `_config.yml`  `_config.yml` .
[live2d-widget.js API](https://l2dwidget.js.org/docs/class/src/index.js~L2Dwidget.html#instance-method-init)
- 
```yml
# Live2D
## https://github.com/EYHN/hexo-helper-live2d
## https://l2dwidget.js.org/docs/class/src/index.js~L2Dwidget.html#instance-method-init
live2d:
  enable: true
  #enable: false
  scriptFrom: local # 
  pluginRootPath: live2dw/ # ()
  pluginJsPath: lib/ # 
  pluginModelPath: assets/ # 
  # scriptFrom: jsdelivr # jsdelivr CDN
  # scriptFrom: unpkg # unpkg CDN
  # scriptFrom: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget@3.x/lib/L2Dwidget.min.js #  url
  tagMode: false # ,  live2d tag
  debug: false # , 
  model:
    use: live2d-widget-model-hibiki
    # use: live2d-widget-model-wanko # npm-module package name
    # use: wanko # /live2d_models/ 
    # use: ./wives/wanko # 
    # use: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/live2d-widget-model-wanko@1.0.5/assets/wanko.model.json #  url
  display:
    position: right
    width: 145
    height: 315
  mobile:
    show: true # 
    scale: 0.5 #        
  react:
    opacityDefault: 0.7
    opacityOnHover: 0.8
```
---
##### 4
> Everything is ok. But you have to do by yourself.
